Package com.reminder.project.email

Class EmailService

java.lang.Object
com.reminder.project.email.EmailService
@Service
@EnableScheduling
public class EmailService
extends java.lang.Object
Class dedicated to handling email functionality with and around sendGrid

    • dailyCheckerForTireMail

      @Scheduled(cron="0 0 0 */1 * *") public void dailyCheckerForTireMail()
      checks daily if notification is required to be sent Checks SUMMER/WINTER 1/21 days before of the time this method runs Out commented sections is for manuel testing, needs to be reverted manually again

    • sortCarsAndUsersThatNeedRedMinderMail

      public void sortCarsAndUsersThatNeedRedMinderMail​(java.lang.String now)
      Sorts users for cars that tireHasChanged bool set to false
      Parameters:
      now - is the MonthDay in string format from dailyCheckerForTireMail()

    • sendTireNotification

      public void sendTireNotification​(java.lang.String now, java.lang.String email, java.util.List<Car> cars)
      method that uses the Sendgrid methods to send the emails of change tire notifications
      Parameters:
      now - is the MonthDay in string format from sortCarsAndUsersThatNeedRedMinderMail
      email - is the Email of a User that has one or more cars that has tireHasChanged bool set to false
      cars - is a list of cars that has tireHasChanged bool set to false of one specific user

    • resetBool

      @Scheduled(cron="0 0 0 20 5,12 *") public void resetBool()
      checks in set intervals to reset tireHasChanged to false

    • sendEmailConfirmation

      public void sendEmailConfirmation​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String verificationToken)
      method that uses the Sendgrid methods to send the emails for registration email confirmation
      Parameters:
      email - email to be sent to
      verificationToken - security token

    • sendRecoveryEmail

      public void sendRecoveryEmail​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String recoveryToken)
      method that uses the Sendgrid methods to send the emails for recovery of user accounts
      Parameters:
      email - email to be sent to
      recoveryToken - security token
